SVIVE50A.MX.short_name: SAM ASSET MANAGEMENT SA DE CV F
SVIVE50A.MX.long_name: Fondo SAM Balanceado 13, S.A. de C.V. F.I.R.V. A
SVIVE50A.MX.summary: The aim of the "Santander pension funds" is put at the disposal of investors an investment alternative to the funds for the retirement savings. The funds are designed to offer an investment depending on the age of the investor strategy, looking for competitive returns with a combination of equity and debt instruments chords to the investment policies and the risk of each Fund.
SVIVE50A.MX.family: SAM Asset Management SA de CV
